chat: Transform input university names into a standardized format by ensuring consistency in naming and including the country suffix "USA" when applicable.

tuples.input: University of Pennsylvania Phialdelphia- PA- USA
tuples.output: University of Pennsylvania- Phialdelphia- PA- USA

tuples.input: University of Maryland College Park College Park- MD
tuples.output: University of Maryland College Park- College Park- MD- USA

tuples.input: Cornell University Ithaca- New York- USA
tuples.output: Cornell University- Ithaca- New York- USA

tuples.input: University of Michigan Ann Arbor- MI- USA
